stlib.datatypes.unit.spatial.util

Class MovableSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • stlib.datatypes.unit.spatial.util.MovableSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovableSpatial, MovableSegmentIF

    public class MovableSegment
extends java.lang.Object
implements MovableSegmentIF
    This class represents 'MovableSegment' objects, which are generally used to build 'UnitRegion' objects
    Author:
    Markus Fuessel
